name: 數學師資訓練（一）
description: 數學師資訓練(或稱數學師資培育)的研究可以大致區分為「三大面向」，亦即，「數學教師的專業素養和教學實踐(簡稱A1i)」、「數學教師專業發展和社會化過程中教學概念的適應、內化和轉換(簡稱A2i)」和「數學教學概念的培育課程(簡稱A3i)」(包括「教育實習輔導」的相關研究)。另有一個較少被關注的研究面向是「數學師資培育者的專業素養、教學、發展、社會化和培育課程(簡稱MAi)」，而師資培育的整體概覽則歸為「綜論(簡稱O)」。
goals: 探究整體的數學師資訓練研究面向
探究數學教師專業素養的內涵
探究數學教師的課堂教學實踐
syllabus:
1\. 數學師資培育研究的「三面向一失落狀態」

2\. 討論數學教師的「專業需求」

  

Topics and content that will be discussed during the course sessions detailed as follows.

1\. Knowledge and beliefs in mathematics teaching and teaching development

\---Mathematics discipline knowledge for teaching

\---Mathematics for and in teaching

\---Knowledge of equity, diversity and culture in teaching mathematics

\---Assessment, and research on, teacher knowledge 

2\. Tools and processes in mathematics teacher education

\---Cases as tools in mathematics teacher education

\---Tasks in mathematics teacher education

\---Research in mathematics education as tools in mathematics teacher education

3\. Participants in mathematics teacher education

\---Individual mathematics teachers as learners

\---Teams of mathematics teachers as learners

\---Communities and networks of mathematics teachers as learners

\---Schools, regions and nations as mathematics learners

\---Teachers and teacher educators as key players in the further development of the mathematics teaching profession

4\. The mathematics teacher educator as a developing professional

\---Challenges and theory in mathematics teacher education

\---Reflection on developing as a mathematics teacher educator

\---Working with prospective and practising teachers: What we learn: what we come to know

grading.note: 以課堂上報告、參與討論為主要評量依據。
以形成研究計畫報告為主要評量依據。
